alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued September 22 at 2:40AM MDT until September 22 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 2 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Lake Wind Advisory, southwest winds 18 to 25 mph with gusts up to 30 mph expected. For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 Saturday morning will result in frost formation. * WHERE...For the Lake Wind Advisory, American Falls Reservoir. For the Frost Advisory, the Lower Snake River Plain including Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Fort Hall and Shelley. * WHEN...For the Lake Wind Advisory, from 8 AM this morning to 2 PM MDT this afternoon. For the Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Strong winds and rough waves on area lakes will create hazardous conditions for small craft. Saturday night, frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Boaters on area lakes should use extra caution since strong winds and rough waves can overturn small craft. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
